name: Going Deeper (saur)
description:
Game was created specially for Cosmic Horrors Jam 2022

CONTROLS:

To proceed click after all text is printed. To choose an option click on it.

INFO:

For the game we took photos in different locations and dressed as NPCs together. It was a long developing journey!

Developers:

CarmineOrthus - programming, game design, narrative design

Dnsatan - game design, visual design, sound design
